nodes.text: Barriss Offee's Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor
Barriss Offee piloted a Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor during the Clone Wars.

In 21 BBY, Jedi Padawan Barriss Offee used this starfighter to smash through the Separatist blockade over Umbara with the help of fellow Padawan Ahsoka Tano, allowing the Republic to send their troops to capture the planet, including the 501st Legion, the 212th Attack Battalion and Jedi Master Saesee Tiin's forces.

Barriss Offee's Delta-7B first appeared in Darkness on Umbara, an episode of the Clone Wars animated television series. As with Adi Gallia's Delta-7B and Plo Koon's Blade of Dorin along with Saesee Tiin's Delta-7B and Ahsoka Tano's Delta-7B, Offee's ship shares hull graphics identical in all but color with Obi-Wan Kenobi's Delta-7B. This suggests a reuse of graphics by the production team.
